MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Beansburn and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.20pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Beansburn substation are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.30pm on Monday 12th April 2021
